name: golestan-tea-project
description: Golestan Tea Clone is a front-end mastery project by Ramtin Neshatvar, focused on cloning a commercial site's UI using React and CSS Modules. The primary goal was to implement complex responsive design, including a pixel-perfect Right-to-Left (RTL) layout, a smooth-transition mobile navigation menu, and intricate interactive styling to showcase proficiency in advanced front-end development techniques.
author: ramt11n
